methodref.name: grep
methodref.description: Returns array of the elements of the input array matching a pattern.

methodref.name: match
methodref.description: Seaches subject for a match to the regular expression in the pattern.

methodref.name: match_all
methodref.description: Seaches subject for a match to the regular expression in the pattern.

methodref.name: match_first
methodref.description: Seaches subject for a match to the regular expression in the pattern.

methodref.name: quote
methodref.description: Quote a string with delimiters to include in a regular expression.

methodref.name: replace
methodref.description: Searches subject for matches to pattern and replaces them with replacement.

methodref.name: split
methodref.description: Split a string by a regular expression, flags 'n' - no blank, 'd' - collect delimiters .
